snippet: Germany’s justice minister, Heiko Maas, called for the removal of a federal prosecutor who opened a treason investigation of two journalists.
abstract: German Justice Minister Heiko Maas calls for removal of federal prosecutor Harald Range, who opened treason investigation on journalists Andre Meister and Markus Beckedahl after they published documents related to antiterrorism measures.
lead_paragraph: Germany’s justice minister, Heiko Maas, called for the removal of a federal prosecutor who opened a treason investigation of two journalists.

headline.main: Merkel Aide Seeks Dismissal of Prosecutor Who Opened Treason Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Merkel Aide Seeks Removal of Prosecutor
